mapper.select: select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy from tbl_activity a join (select activityid from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId}) ac on a.id=ac.activityId join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id
